fullLength.title: Visualizations that sell
fullLength.subtitle: or how animations make your video come alive
fullLength.text: This video was a kind of test for me. It was important to me to show that even simple visual editing can be appealing. I think I succeeded.

fullLength.title: Accentuation as a lifeline
fullLength.subtitle: A brief overview of how editing can save even hopeless videos.
fullLength.text: Initially, the narrator of this video had very poor speech delivery, making it incredibly difficult to engage the viewer, but I was able to find an individual approach, taking the video to a new level.

vertical.title: The power of numbers
vertical.text: When you need to make a boring lecture beautiful

vertical.title: AI Duo
vertical.text: A clear illustration of why neural networks with humans at the helm are powerful.

motionGraphics.title: Animated presentation
motionGraphics.subtitle: But at least it's not boring to watch.
motionGraphics.text: The idea for this animation came from Max.Mov's video of configuring Windows 11 for 8 hours, where he made a similar presentation of his system at the beginning.

motionGraphics.title: Gamer interface animation
motionGraphics.subtitle: Systems can look beautiful too
motionGraphics.text: I've long been a fan of system interfaces. So, for me, animating some system component was only a matter of time.
